<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// leave them dangling).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="normal">            AssociatedSections.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/detail/densesetimpl/#a1b0f3ebdced8fce4b22c6a63b25d9525">insert</a>(Sym.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/coff/symbol/#a383c77f95170e1f95b97fb608a1ab3e2">TargetSectionId</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> RemovedSections.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/detail/densesetimpl/#ad409c2de8502b94c8a0b1193307c63b6">contains</a>(Sym.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/coff/symbol/#a383c77f95170e1f95b97fb608a1ab3e2">TargetSectionId</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armlowoverheadloops-cpp/#a3bf42baf773b375802538951c88d8e12">ToRemove</a> = RemoveAssociated;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!AssociatedSections.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/detail/densesetimpl/#a9a3c9d867ff6bde97841c2b7983f5c70">empty</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="normal">  updateSections();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="normal">  updateSymbols();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/coff/object/#a41639273bf671d1b1a59a5a48eb42ec8"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/coff/object/#a41639273bf671d1b1a59a5a48eb42ec8">Object::truncateSections</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function-ref">function&#95;ref</a>&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/coff/section">Section</a> &amp;)&gt; ToTruncate) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/coff/section">Section</a> &amp;Sec : Sections) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ToTruncate(Sec)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><Highlight kind="normal">      Sec.clearContents();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><Highlight kind="normal">      Sec.Relocs.clear();</Highlight></CodeLine>
